entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, described as having fury and wrath.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: A character who suggests disposing of a Mudblood, described as having a wand and being shocked by Ron's arrival.

entities.name: greyback
entities.description: A character who is instructed to take the Mudblood, described as having a wand and participating in the fight.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, who bursts into the drawing room and tries to stop Bellatrix from harming the Mudblood.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: A character whose wand is used by Ron to disarm Bellatrix.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, who helps Ron and tries to stop the fight.

entities.name: lucius malfoy
entities.description: A character who is hit by Harry's spell and collapses onto the hearth.

entities.name: narcissa
entities.description: A character who participates in the fight with her wand.

entities.name: draco
entities.description: A character who participates in the fight with his wand.

entities.name: mudblood
entities.description: A group of people that Bellatrix suggests disposing of.

relationships.description: Bellatrix suggests disposing of the Mudblood, as described in the text: 'And I think, we can dispose of the Mudblood. Greyback, take her if you want her.'
Ron disarms Bellatrix with his wand, as described in the text: 'Bellatrix looked around, shocked; she turned her wand to face Ron instead —“Expelliarmus!”'
Harry hits Lucius Malfoy with his spell, as described in the text: 'Harry yelled, “Stupefy!” and Lucius Malfoy collapsed onto the hearth.'
Harry attacks Draco with his wand, as described in the text: 'Jets of light ﬂew from Draco’s, Narcissa’s, and Greyback’s wands; Harry threw himself to the ﬂoor, rolling behind a sofa to avoid them.'

Harry attacks Narcissa with his wand, as described in the text: 'Jets of light ﬂew from Draco’s, Narcissa’s, and Greyback’s wands; Harry threw himself to the ﬂoor, rolling behind a sofa to avoid them.'

Harry attacks Greyback with his wand, as described in the text: 'Jets of light ﬂew from Draco’s, Narcissa’s, and Greyback’s wands; Harry threw himself to the ﬂoor, rolling behind a sofa to avoid them.'
Greyback is instructed by Bellatrix to take the Mudblood, as described in the text: 'And I think, we can dispose of the Mudblood. Greyback, take her if you want her.'
